title: Design user interface wireframes
description: Create detailed wireframes for the main dashboard, task boards, and user management interfaces

title: Implement drag and drop functionality
description: Add HTML5 drag and drop support for moving tasks between different status columns on the Kanban board

title: Create project dashboard with analytics
description: Build a comprehensive dashboard showing project progress, task completion rates, and team productivity metrics

title: Set up task filtering and search
description: Implement advanced filtering options by status, priority, assignee, and due date with real-time search functionality

title: Add task due date notifications
description: Create a notification system to alert users about upcoming task deadlines and overdue items

title: Implement task archiving system
description: Build functionality to archive completed tasks while maintaining the ability to view and restore them when needed

title: Write comprehensive documentation
description: Create user guides, API documentation, and developer setup instructions for the project

title: Optimize mobile responsiveness
description: Ensure the application works seamlessly across all device sizes with touch-friendly interactions
